website_summaries.verdict: The best vacuum marinator to choose when the highest level of flavor is required for a meal.
pros: Unique design combines a vacuum-sealed container with a motorized tumbler to move meats and liquids inside
Control panel has a built-in timer with an automatic shut-off function
Marinator can be set for a number of different recipes and meats
cons: The marinator can take longer with certain types of meat, such as beef and pork

customer_reviews.title: Display stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Display stopped working after 4 months and only used about 20 times love what it does still works but no timer Finally got a answer to question Called them great customer service New bottom on its way

customer_reviews.title: Minor change helps this unit operate better
customer_reviews.text: We were able to marinate 2 roasts with the minor change of adding 2 rubber bands to either side of the container. The added traction really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: ... is the 2nd one I have owned and I LOVE it. Make sure to wash container by hand ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have owned and I LOVE it. Make sure to wash container by hand to avoid cracking of the container. That will most definitely cause problems. Don't drop it or put it in the dishwasher and your All good! Enjoy those tasty meats. Awesome bonus of the tenderizer utensil as well!
customer_reviews.author: nb3006

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review till I've gotten some good use out of it. Mostly making jerky but a few chicken breasts and steaks here and there. Has worked very well. Easy to use. Takes less time than expected. Would buy another again in a heartbeat. Very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: shanghai000

customer_reviews.title: Best thing EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how fabulous this machine is. Right off the first try and the chicken was amazing!! So flavorful and tender and juicy. Then we tried it with Filet Minion and it was even better. A little tip, even though the normal time on there will work, we went ahead and doubled the times to make that marinade really soak into the meats. It was well worth the wait. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to get one.
customer_reviews.author: El Gordo Tejano

customer_reviews.title: Strange invention
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to use this device to marinade chicken wings before I fried them. I add the sauce and the chicken, stirred and vacuumed. It was not bad but I don’t really see any difference in taste by using this or without it. To me, this device is like a easier way to stir the meat as you can turn them. However, takes up too much space to store it while not using.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine G

customer_reviews.title: Works well on first try but seems kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We had a Reveo model for a long time which was solid, worked well and did a great job. Eventually something in the motor broke so we had to look for another. Since Reveo stopped making them years ago, we did our homework and selected the Chef's Elite. We've only used it once and it seemed to work OK but the drum moves very slowly (in contrast to the Reveo) and the size of the drum is significantly smaller. After we've used it longer and on different foods, if there continues to be no problems, I will probably change my rating to a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Sherman

customer_reviews.title: The first time I used it the lid stayed on and the filet's were marinated nicely. The second time using wings the lid fell ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid is only held on by vacuum, it should have some other means of keeping it from falling off. The first time I used it the lid stayed on and the filet's were marinated nicely. The second time using wings the lid fell off and the marinade went in the spaces around the drive wheels, soaked the inner workings and came out the vent holes underneath. The counter was a mess. I gave it a summary cleanup, put it back in the box and processed a return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Kitchen Toy
customer_reviews.text: Cannot lie - was a skeptic. My husband mentioned wanting this and, like a typical nagging wife, thought, great, something else we'll use the first month and then store for eternity. I have been proven wrong. We have used our marinator at least once a week since we bought it over 1.5 years ago. The flavor truly penetrates your food! Forget tossing your food and marinade in a ziploc baggie the night before just hoping the flavor will adhere. (That's the other perk - you don't have to plan!) We recommend this product to anyone who is registering for a wedding or just loves to cook phenomenal meals at home.
customer_reviews.author: ben butler

customer_reviews.title: The meat is the most tender i have eaten
customer_reviews.text: Works incredible. my chicken after 15 min was the softest i have eaten, i will be using this so much from now on
customer_reviews.author: An Aussie Farming in the Philippines

customer_reviews.title: So far So good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. So far I haven't had any problems that other have reported. Using it to marinate my jerky in minutes instead of days. Easy to clean up. Cylinder seems sturdy. Rotates kinda slow but no slippage yet. No leaks from cylinder seal. Not for large amounts of meat, would recommend you not fill it over 1/4 full. So far So good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rollers do not roll anymore after about 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: not sure what the exact issue with this particular unit but, it was working fine after about 5 uses the motor just stopped working very disapointing was looking forward to using it for my jerky, not sure if I want to re purchase seeing that this is a common issue. Update returned the first unit they did replace it no problem however the second unit stop rotating because the wheels don't grip the barrel, not worth the hastle I would not purchase this unit, it gives out on like the fourth it 5th use.
customer_reviews.author: Rod B.

customer_reviews.title: Great results, cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use. Simple instructions. Vacuum process is fast, about 2 minutes. Tumbler is near silent. Easy to clean. Cons: The compartment where the hose is kept broke as soon as I opened it. Very cheap plastic. The free tenderizer also broke as soon as I used it. The plastic shield covering the blades cracked when I hit beef. Overall: Highly recommended product; but be careful not to put the canister into a dishwasher and be aware of easily breakable pieces. Spend the $10 and get a real tenderizer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Irey

customer_reviews.title: bought it few months ago but used it today to find out that the air vaccum works good but when put about one pound of chicken on ...
customer_reviews.text: quite disasppointing !! bought it few months ago but used it today to find out that the air vaccum works good but when put about one pound of chicken on the canister and on the rollers , they do not move at all ! yes if you empty it then it moves well ! so the only fucntion left is that of air tighting the marinade for the shaking will have to use my biceps to do it ! ( Exercise in blessing I guess LOL !!) out of the return /warrnaty !! so All i can do is the leave the review here !!
customer_reviews.author: Aamer

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised that this item worked so great I’m use to using 400 lb tumbler but bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this item worked so great I’m use to using 400 lb tumbler but bought this to try at my house I definitely recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.  Seems a bit expensive but it should last forever and it's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she loves it. I love it to because the steak comes out extremely tender and only one piece to clean is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Tenderize the meat
customer_reviews.text: Tenderized a sliced boston pork butt and marinated for 15 min. in the McCormick smokey habanero marinade. Turned out great.The meat had flavor all the way thru.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Like how meat marinated. Pain when you first start using have to turn it then it’ll work and have to do again. My son in law has one says after you use it a bit it’ll start automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I knew about this product before, its incredible!!! I use it to prep beef for jerky, marinade chicken and beef for the grill. Its really worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product — Silence The Beeps & Hand Wash (you’ll thank me later) ✌🏻
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Follow instructions and don’t put the lid in the dishwasher as it the gasket will eventually get compromised with extreme temps. Don’t be lazy. Just wash it all by hand for the 6 minutes of life & store it. You care for it...it’ll treat you well. Wish I could turn off the beeps — my 9 y/o Labrador wishes more than me!! 😩
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Contributor

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for small batches. Tip, if you put grip tape on the canister this will keep it from slipping on larger batches
customer_reviews.author: Mark J

customer_reviews.title: Want another
customer_reviews.text: Game changer in the kitchen. Love this thing so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rose Dubosque

customer_reviews.title: I think this was a good buy. Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Has done a very good job at marinating the meats that I have used it for. This system works better than doing it at the old fashion way much more flavor in the meat.
customer_reviews.author: H Michael Ketchie

customer_reviews.title: Uses less to do the same.
customer_reviews.text: Uses 2/3 less marinate to accomplish the same results without using the unit on meat. Works like you would hope it would. Good investment in your cooking arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Tumbler works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, creates nicely marinated meats in just a few minutes! Have tumbled chicken breasts, legs, wings and gizzards. Nice and flavorful, and T-bone steaks are the best ever coming out tender and juicy every time!
customer_reviews.author: A. Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: We love this machine. It has revolutionized marinating for our family. Recipes that used to require an overnight plan have now turned into a short 40 min prep time. Our house burned down a few months ago, and this was one of the early kitchen gadgets that we replaced. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa in CA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make some beef jerky. This was just what I needed. Instead of marinading 1 to 2 days like I usually did,I was able to do it in about 15 minutes. What a time saver. Now I can have jerky the same day. The instructions were straight forward and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: John Reisinger, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The unit does a fantastic job. However after five hours of use the lid fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Harris

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing machine. I used for Jerky and it seemed to work great on beef. Not so much the deer. Need to marinade that for longer I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Razorbacks!

customer_reviews.title: Automated
customer_reviews.text: For the price its hard to argue. But they dont have variable speeds on the rotate and i dont know the pressure its vacuuming. could it be 15psi or 22psi? no one will ever know.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Boring

customer_reviews.title: A Must in any marinade type applications
customer_reviews.text: Made elk jerky as soon as i got it. Made 25 lbs in 4 different batches and took less than1.25 hours. Worked amazing and will be used with anticipation.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I am glad these are available again. I had another Brand which broke 3 years ago. Since then I had been looking for a replacement. A must have for every BBQ fan. Quick tasty marinades. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schroder

customer_reviews.title: No vacuum or RPM control. To slow to for proper vacuum marination
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum tumbler does not allow you to control the RPM or put a readout on the vacuum that it pulls. This is key information on a vacuum tumbler. Those this product work to coat product with spices, yes! it is good to do a 5% marination yes, More than that it is not worth the money. That is just an honest opinion from a meat scientist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, I use it all the time. The best part is that it’s dishwasher safe, just make sure you don’t use the High-Temp drying feature on tourney washer.
customer_reviews.author: christopher bonner

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: The seal on the drum doesn’t stay sealed very well. I’ve had it open a number of times while rotating and spill all over the unit. Since I couldn’t really find any other options at this cost. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Marinated some steaks.. awesome. Very easy to use and clean up is easy as well. The manufacturer needs to modify the traction wheels... I should not have add rubber bands for more traction.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell L.  Leggett

customer_reviews.title: needed more understanding info  in the book
customer_reviews.text: the book was not enough info on how to used the wire do you plug in and let it hang on the out side or what, the book was so hard to understand about the wire. do you let it stay under the vacuum marinator let hang outside. the book did not say.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn palms

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: My husband marinated a prime rib excellent taste love how fast it works very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Ree Ree

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Quick way to marinate foods
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Quick way to marinate foods! Also, very tasty recipes included!
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does the job everytime.
customer_reviews.text: i was using Gourmia, and broke in 2 use, after change to this one, its rock solid, i had it for almost 6 months now, it does the job everytime.
customer_reviews.author: J. L

customer_reviews.title: so far so good,
customer_reviews.text: used it several times in the first few months of having it, so far so good,
customer_reviews.author: Gary Betzler

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for bison and it's night and day from normal and you don't need to use chemical tenderizers or excessive salt.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Lets you use all grades of meat and they all come out perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Simple but effective. Lets you use all grades of meat and they all come out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LarryO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Marinates all types of food, and makes everything juicy and delicious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this a long time ago! It saves so much time and now we don't have to worry about remembering to pre-marinate. Last minute meals requiring marinating are no longer ruled out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great..just do it right...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problems so far, as per some of the reviews. Just make sure that the inter lid seal ( silicone ) is dry before you vac. seal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say but I had to return both of them for the same reason the timer stop working and it stop rotating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... husband for Father's Day and so far it hasn't disappointed us. This makes marinating meat quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day and so far it hasn't disappointed us. This makes marinating meat quick and easy, and leaves the meat full of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and marinade (you can use less because it ...
customer_reviews.text: Saves time and marinade (you can use less because it moves around and covers all pieces) and it marinates deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Fenwick

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product. Makes a huge difference in the marinating process. Add so much more flavor than standard marinating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tri Tips
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are a bit vague. Make sure to use the vacuum and watch out for the tenderizer
customer_reviews.author: DaKine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for beef teriyaki and chicken teriyaki and it's amazing I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Paul butkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Ease of operation.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum tumbler is AWESOME! Just the correct size for making jerky and marinating chicken. Easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Beyer

customer_reviews.title: You haven’t purchased this already!!
customer_reviews.text: Must have!! So easy to use and clean up. Makes marinatining a snap. Great for jerky, steaks, chicken. This eliminates the need for overnite marinating.
customer_reviews.author: Skymarshal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love my Chef's Elite marinator. Never after chicken breasts before I bought this. They turn out moist and juicy. Recommended this product to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey r kohlmann

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for every kitchen. I’ve used it on steaks and chicken wings so far and each time they’ve tasted better than ever before. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: he was really impressed and has liked the way it works
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boss as a gift for someone who has everything at Christmas, he was really impressed and has liked the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and results of the marinated meat is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: christine hale

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job marinating the roasts that I was preparing. It really made a differnce
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that I only used it twice on the 3rd try it stopped tumbling and customer service won't answer nor call back what a waist
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Timer buttons dont work
customer_reviews.text: Cool machine love what it does.. But the timer buttons dont work
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well no issues. ..very impressed so far..use it about 3 times a week...no issues with it ..I always hand wash just in case too....it recommends tenderizing what ever meat you wanting to marinate and that is VERY important as to how well this product can do its job......if you use it correctly you should be very pleased as I have been...so far have marinated chicken,pork,steak,fish,scallops,and even lobsters!! If used correctly you can taste the flavor in the meat quite well....VERY HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill E

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use. Put alot of flavor to meats and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morris

customer_reviews.title: lid came off and my wonderful gadget went kaput
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly when i received it. Naturally I don't use it everyday, 3rd time i used it was about a month and a half after purchase, and it had a little leak i guess, So, while it was tumbling, lid came off and my wonderful gadget went kaput!!!! wanted to return, but it was a couple of days after the return window. S90 out, can't return, and cant get in touch with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Banks

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: The product i bought won't even turn on. no power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I just used it for the second time and all seemed perfectly fine until 15 minutes in
customer_reviews.text: purchased in january, the dial on the lid broke immediately (like stated in other reviews) so it wouldn't hold a vacuum no matter what position. I found that placing tape over the vacuum hole works, but I just used it for the second time and all seemed perfectly fine until 15 minutes in, and it dumped all contents everywhere. Unit is toast, and I am "out of return window" so I'm leaving this review instead of returning it. 90 bucks wasted and I got to use it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Camaron n.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, straight out of the box. The wheels don't grip the tumbler, so it doesn't spin. At all.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Does exactly what it says it does! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Display burns out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that I've purchased in the last couple of years. This is also the last one I will purchase. I've had this one about 2 1/2 months now and the display screen is completely blank. I purchased this one to replace my previous one when the display on that one went on the fritz after about a year. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to marinate more than one chicken breast at a time
customer_reviews.text: This thing works ok if you are doing veggeis or something else very light. I put two chicken breasts in and it was too heave to rotate the drum. I would love to return this and get a refund. Definitely not worth almost $100 to marinate one pice of chicken at a time
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My display quit working after 3 uses. I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My display quit working after 3 uses. I didn't notice any additional flavor or tenderness versus using a Ziploc bag or container.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum sealed meat tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum sealed meat tumbler. It is exactly what I needed to help me perfect my jerky making ability. I'm no master yet but I am a lot closer now with the use of this handy little machine; not to mention the mess that is avoided by using it. Marinating meat now is a matter of minutes instead of hours like before. I would recommend this for anyone that likes to marinate their meats before cooking. It is an absolute no-brainer! Sincerely, Ken South Carolina
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! No flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! No flavor, I use about 4ttbls I’m coffee every morning, also in my shakes! Love it I just go through it too fast! Came packaged perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aza

customer_reviews.title: The unit does what it says, but after the ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit does what it says, but after the fourth time using it, the digital display went out and I have no info on the unit, but it does operate. I just had it to go out on me and have not tried for a replacement yet.The rating will go up or down one star depending on the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil S

customer_reviews.title: Bad product and can't return it!
customer_reviews.text: This was given to me as a Father's Day gift. When I first used it the vacuum pump took a very long time to create the vacuum. The next time I used it the vacuum was supposedly created but when it was rotating the top fell off. I gave it another try and the same thing happened. Now I'm trying to return it but Amazon Prime won't allow the return because it's past 30 days even though it is clearly a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Zipper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked good so far. I think the motor could be a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stilson

customer_reviews.title: Have had manual vacuum marinators before and really liked them but always managed to make them implode by ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had manual vacuum marinators before and really liked them but always managed to make them implode by pumping out too much air. Not a problem with the STX-1000! Fill it, put the lid on, attach the suction hose, start the machine and it's done. My implosion days are over and I am happily marinating! OK, it's been a while now. The base of the container has developed cracks. It will not hold a vacuum! How do I know? The lid came off as it was rotating, marinate went everywhere! Tried to get a new container, but was told the didn't have them. Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CRR

customer_reviews.title: Update.....Great meat tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Update.....The company sent me a replacement, this tumbler works fantastic. I'm not only impressed by the tumbler but also the quick response from customer service and wiliness to make it right ...Mine doesn't work....instructions say it takes 2 to 3 minutes to vacuum the air out of the canister. Well i'm working on almost 10 mins and the pump is still suctioning. I hope the company will send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: DougdTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: We tried it yesterday and it turned our choice ribeye into prime! It soaked up three quarters of a cup of marinade visibly expanding the rib eye which we then smoked and it was divine! I ate the left over on the bone this morning and I wanted to gnaw on the bone it was so good!!!! The tenderizer is perfect with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Display Malfunctions - Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update: Just called the number that I was given about the display not working and was told that I would have to pay for shipping it back to them and hopefully they could fix it. No thanks! Not worth the money or aggravation. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!! I have only used this product 3 times and the display has never worked properly. It blinks and you can't read it while the canister is turning. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SHERYL WATTS

customer_reviews.title: One of the best in innovations for cooking since the Microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: Had a few different marinating machines. This one isn't perfect but it's pretty awesome, easy to use and compact. I can marinate a tri tip steak in 30 mins that tastes better than one marinating in the fridge for 24 hours. If you cook a lot of things that require marinating this is a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: PokerStar81

customer_reviews.title: Very cool... but!
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome addition to my kitchen gadgets; although, I have taken away one star because while the container is quite big and you can put quite a lot of meat to marinade, the rotors (or the texture of the bowl that touches the rotors) is not good enough. The wheel keeps spinning but the bowl does not budge - keeps skidding. This is an engineering fault that has been overlooked. They could have easily overcome this by creating gear grooves on the rotor and the bowl. Anyway, hope they'll add this in the future. Other than that, it's a solid gadget with a lot of promise and does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Chef's Elite Marinator
customer_reviews.text: The marinator is very easy to use and works well as long as you don't put too much in it. I have only used it once and it worked well, but I can see if you put too much in it, the barrel would probably have a hard time turning because the motor doesn't seem very strong. Other than that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: shelby331

customer_reviews.title: First Time Use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be OK so far. Good vacuum seal - just being very careful when placing on or off the base. Have done three runs of pork for jerky tonight. Averaging about 5 lbs per with plenty of room left in canister. I would not go more than seven lbs to give room to tumble properly. One thing I am worried about - There is a quite loud 'popping' noise coming from the gears inside base. It does this even with no canister in place. Still turns OK but wondering about longevity. Just put jerky in dehydrator so can't speak for the vacuum of the marinade into the meat. Maybe will update review later. So far give it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: K. Street

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: The top of the tumbler comes off! You need to be very careful and check twice before marinating. Overall it works really well! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Much easier marinating - Fast
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's easy. I can do things in batches then freeze them (FoodSaver) if I'm not ready to grille, broil or fry the meat right away. The earlier comment from someone "weird" watching the meat flop around........I have to second that one :-)
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best invention since a meat slicer. This tumbler works great. I used 20% of my normal marinade and every piece of meat I put in it came out even seasoned and soaked. This will definitely speed up my process of making jerky. If you’ve been on the fence about buying one, just pull the trigger. You will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: Anibal Valadas

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Works great !! Simple to operate , and it performs as described . I marinated steak strips in about 20 minutes and got great results. You would've thought I had them marinating for 2 days . ,DON'T throw away the box , it's best to keep it for storage in between use .
customer_reviews.author: robert j.

customer_reviews.title: Nice marinator
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, better flavor of meats when you vacuum tumbler. Rpm is a bit slow and the vacuum pulled seems a bit low, but for the price a nice piece of equipment for your kitchen
customer_reviews.author: R. Shigemura

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was just a gimmick until I received it and tried it out with 3 lbs of skinless chicken breasts. Awesome machine, well built and quiet when tumbling. After vacuuming (less than 3 minutes) and tumbling for 15 minutes, I grilled the chicken. It came out perfectly delicious
customer_reviews.author: JG (Highflyer)Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job. Having problems from the beginning ...
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job. Having problems from the beginning with the barrel not rotating. Had to put masking tape around it to make it rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: A steak lovers dream.
customer_reviews.text: So long to a tough steak. I can't say enough good about this product. I will not cook meat without first putting it in the tumbler. Not only will your meat be more tender it will be juicier as well. GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SomeGUY

customer_reviews.title: Works to me. Far from pro level device.
customer_reviews.text: It is far from basic professional grade tumblers. More mixing than vacuum tumbling. Absorption rate is low. Considering price possible option if you’re not into serious tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fastest way to marinate Meat and Vegitable
customer_reviews.text: This is the fastest way to marinate fish, meat or vegetables. Large enough tumbler to hold a full chicken. Make sure to cut down on the portion of marinate and follow instruction on the timeing to avoide over-marinade.
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: but so far like how it flavors meat
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the marinator a few times, but so far like how it flavors meat. The first time I used one of the manufacturer's recipes and it was much too salty. The second time I used an online recipe and it was great. Looking forward to getting a lot of use from this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every time we bbq, this is a must first step after mixing all ingredients for marinating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: No magic but ok for a quick shot of marinade.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dinner is easier with my new vegetable and meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it.is to use and how easy it is to clean
customer_reviews.author: louise suraci

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can do this!!
customer_reviews.text: Pleased so far. Still experimenting but having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made very cheep, but will work a few times.
customer_reviews.text: Well i used it twice, but third time the lock,unlock ring assembly came apart. I have fixed it but isnt holding up very well. All plastic!
customer_reviews.author: josh justice

product_meta.title: STX International STX-1000-CE Chef's Elite 15 Minute Meat & Vegetable Vacuum Marinator with Auto Shut Off and Free Meat Tenderizer
product_meta.description:
The STX Model STX-1000-CE Chef's Elite 15 Minute Marinating System brings Super Fast Meat, Poultry, Pork, Chicken & Vegetable marinating to your kitchen counter. Why wait hours, Even Days to marinate your favorite meals when now, with one Simple To Use Product, you can marinate your favorite items in 15 Minutes or Less? Vacuum Marinating is the Secret!



The STX Chef's Elite 15 Minute Marinade System relies on VACUUM MARINATING. When a vacuum is created inside the marinating drum, air gaps are created in the meat, fish, pork, etc., and the marinade rushes into these gaps to quickly enhance your favorite flavor. Dense muscle meats, like chicken breasts, should be perforated with a Meat Tenderizer which we have included Free with this unit or suitable utensil prior to processing to insure proper marinade penetration.



The STX Chef's Elite Vacuum Marinating System includes a durable and easy to clean marinating drum, motorized rotating vacuum base and our Operating/Instruction Manual with more than a dozen great marinating recipes. Imagine Pumping Up your favorite meals with Cayenne Habanero Marinade, Hawaiian Marinade, Honey BBQ Marinade, Spicy Asian Marinade, and Many More!



The STX Chef's Elite Vacuum Marinating System is completely self-contained. The digital control panel has a Built in Timer with an Automatic Shut-Off Function for your convenience. It also displays recommendations for the processing time for different food items.The vacuum tubing is stored in a handy compartment. Most all recipes call for marinating times of less than 30 minutes, and the majority of recipes recommend 15 minutes. Last Minute meal preparation is now a snap with the STX Chef's Elite Marinating System.
feature_bullets: STX Chef's Elite 15 Minute Vacuum Marinating System Model STX-1000-CE with Auto Shut Off Timer and Meat Tenderizer
Brings Super Fast Meat, Poultry, Pork, Chicken & Vegetable Marinating to Your Kitchen Counter.
Last Minute Food Marinating a Snap with 15 Minute or Less Marinating Times for Most All Recipes.
Includes Operating/Instruction Manual with More Than A Dozen Marinating Recipes.
The Digital Control Panel has a Built In Timer with an Automatic Shut-Off Function.
